overview: Two butch daddies arrange to meet in the basement of a large, very old building. Both have full beards, washboard abs and hairy chests. The first one has already started jerking off in front of the old furnace with his shirt off, a porno magazine and a tall can of suds. The second guy is wearing a yellow hardhat, blue work shirt, and jeans with the crotch expertly torn in just the right places.
title: Hairy Muscle Daddy 1
